extendedInfo.description: ELEAD Mobile App provides complete access to ELEAD CRM solutions.  Enjoy total visibility and maximize data performance with our easy-to-use Mobile App designed to generate more deals on the sales board.  No matter your location, ELEAD Mobile App provides 100% access to customers, customer data, inventory, follow up and Internet lead tools to capitalize on every business opportunity.  Seamless real-time integration with the in-store CRM ensures up-to-date data is available to authorized users at all times.The ELEAD mobile portal is user-friendly and intuitive enabling users to instantly add prospects, find existing customers, modify profiles and manage work plan tasks.  No matter your location, respond to an Internet lead with an email or phone call to quickly stop the clock. Managers can easily view the desk log for daily activities and statistics, browse new and used inventory, add inventory or scan the VIN and tie the customer to an appraisal.Never worry about missed opportunities again! The ELEAD Mobile App provides the same robust CRM solution that you have come to expect, in an easy-to-use mobile application.  ELEAD1ONE is proud to introduce the revolutionary ELEAD Mobile App that brings you closer to customers and the sale generating maximum revenue opportunities.

reviews.title: Working with Elead for 3 years
reviews.comment: Great app would like to be able to go back on dates
reviews.author: Victod Ng

reviews.title: No need to download
reviews.comment: Its easier to login to the website than use this app.
reviews.author: Adam Denault

reviews.title: Good but one suggestion
reviews.comment: Needs to have a scanner for driver license to add prospect. Would make life so much easier and faster.
reviews.author: John Truong

reviews.title: * Disclaimer ELEAD Employee
reviews.comment: I have to hand it to the team they have done a nice job here.  We really appreciate all of the feedback, and I can tell you all we are listening.  The initial releases are all geared towards basic functionality and actions we could visualize users managing from the palm of their hand.  I\'ve made note of the feature requests in the previous reviews and we\'ll evaluate them for feasibility and utility.  Keep the positive feedback coming,
reviews.author: Brian Jacobs

reviews.title: Priceless app
reviews.comment: This app is golden since our managers horde our used inventory info. I don\'t have to find a manager or walk the lot to find out the price of a vehicle. I can add leads as soon as I meet them without breaking the connection to use a computer. I don\'t understand why people want every single feature from the website to be in the app. Stop being so anal the app is new and has room for development. Excellent job!
reviews.author: Malcom Gross

reviews.title: Good app (room for improvement)
reviews.comment: Very nice being able to add prospects and scan vins for trade info, would be nice to be able to scan drivers license, view our actual calender/work plan and see the notes that we already have on the customer. I am the Internet Sales manager so I am actually working deals as well so being able to create a sales quote would be pretty handy too. Obviously we can login on the actual website to do all of this but for this app to be top notch those things would most def help. Good start though.
reviews.author: Branden Lamberson

reviews.title: JC
reviews.comment: Works great on my Galaxy S3 with android 4.1.1 but it is not compatible with my Nexus 7 running 4.2.2. I really like having eleads out on lot with me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start...
reviews.comment: I haven\'t gotten to use the VIN scan yet, but the simple things within the customer information and tasks are rather dumbed down. Unable to edit tasks, change customer status, seeing future tasks in organizer, and seeing previously sold customers. It would be nice if this could be an application that allows you to work away from the dealership. Sadly, it\'s not.
reviews.author: marcy s

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: Works well except the only way to get phone numbers is to search the customer.. needs to show active leads and phone number for overdue activities
reviews.author: Jason Reed

reviews.title: Always downloading updates
reviews.comment: Second rate.  I haven\'t been able to log on yet because it is always downloading the updates. you would think that the app in the store would be the most recent. typical for this crm.  I can\'t wait to switch to something better.
reviews.author: Shannon Warren

reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
reviews.comment: Helps to close my deals because I can access all the information fast!
reviews.author: Jeremy Buehler

reviews.title: Great but needs more
reviews.comment: Need notifications for incoming email and leads.
reviews.author: Chris Maynard

reviews.title: Good Start
reviews.comment: Barcode scanner doesn\'t work. There is more than a little lag and I know this not my gs3. Also, as others have mentioned we could use a license scanner. Overall though, it is a good start.
reviews.author: Chad Smith

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Always says I need an internet connection, but I have one.
reviews.author: Wesley Diederich

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work to be useful.
reviews.author: Lee Call

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Sweet deal... this is going to make things so much easier.  Thanks guys
reviews.author: stephen custred

reviews.comment: Too easy
reviews.author: Kyle Sturgis

reviews.title: Pos
reviews.comment: Inventory is worthless only shows 5 cars
reviews.author: Bob Snead

reviews.title: Sales director
reviews.comment: Awesome app
reviews.author: Brad Owens

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: You can answer emails, leads, load templates, scan VINs, and much more... Nothing else out there like it! Great job. Using 4.2.2 on my Nexus
reviews.author: William Bryant
